project.title: AMZL WHS Coordinator Quest

description.short: A retro 16-bit warehouse safety adventure that transforms OSHA training into an epic gaming experience.
description.medium: AMZL WHS Coordinator Quest is a nostalgic 16-bit game that gamifies workplace safety training. Built with vanilla JavaScript and procedural generation, it features AI-driven dialogue, cross-platform support, and zero external dependencies. Choose from five unique characters to battle bosses and fix 100+ warehouse hazards.
description.long: AMZL WHS Coordinator Quest transforms mundane warehouse safety training into an engaging retro gaming experience. Built entirely with vanilla JavaScript and procedural generation, this innovative educational game combines authentic 16-bit aesthetics with cutting-edge technologies including AI-driven dialogue powered by Google Gemini and serverless architecture. Players select from five unique warehouse coordinators, each with distinct abilities and backstories, to navigate procedurally generated warehouse environments while battling nine epic bosses and fixing over 100 real-world safety hazards.

uniqueSellingPoints: Educational entertainment fusion - First game to make OSHA compliance genuinely fun
Zero external assets - Everything generated algorithmically in code
AI-enhanced retro - Cutting-edge AI powering 16-bit aesthetics

technicalHighlights.title: Modular Architecture
technicalHighlights.description: Refactored from 10,256 lines in one file to 27+ organized ES6 modules with 40% code reduction

technicalHighlights.title: Procedural Generation
technicalHighlights.description: All graphics, sprites, and maps generated algorithmically - no external image files

technicalHighlights.title: AI Integration
technicalHighlights.description: Dynamic dialogue powered by Google Gemini with dual TTS systems

technicalHighlights.title: Performance Excellence
technicalHighlights.description: Object pooling, fixed 60 FPS, frame-rate independent physics

technicalHighlights.title: State Machine Design
technicalHighlights.description: 11 game states with Entity-Component-System inspired architecture

technicalHighlights.title: Serverless Backend
technicalHighlights.description: Netlify Functions for secure API management
